markdown.headingText: Model predictions and figures in the main text
markdown.markdown:
## Loading packages, data and functions

```{r}
# data
library(readr)     # reading CSV files
library(here)      # constructing file paths
library(ggeffects) # extracting model predictions
library(tibble)    # creating tibbles (data frames)

# plots
library(scales)    # scale transformations and labels
library(ggplot2)   # data visualization
library(patchwork) # combining plots
```

Reading model results for counting, DR, DC and native and NBT turnover

```{r}
# Data from 03_C_data_preparation.qmd
df_country_complete6 <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data", "processed", "df_country_complete6.csv"))

# Data from 04_D_model_NBTs.qmd
mod_counting_NBT <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                       "models", 
                                       "model_res_counting.rds")) # NBT total countings
mod_DC <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                             "models", 
                             "model_res_dc.rds"))
mod_DR <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                             "models", 
                             "model_res_dr.rds"))
mod_turnover_native <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                          "models",
                                      "model_res_turnover_native.rds"))
mod_turnover_nbt <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                       "models",
                                       "model_res_turnover_nbt.rds"))

# function
sqrt_trans <- scales::trans_new("sqrt_with_zero", 
                        transform = function(x) ifelse(x == 0, 0, sqrt(x)),
                        inverse = function(x) x^2)
```

## Total NBT counting

```{r}
# Extracting predicted values
pred_mod_counting_gdp <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_counting_NBT, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

pred_mod_counting_richness <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_counting_NBT, "native.richness.pad[-0.4:8.6 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4a
a <-
  tibble(
  x= df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.richness.pad,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_counting_gdp,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_counting_gdp,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(trans = sqrt_trans,
                     expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = c(0,100,1000,10000),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  guides(
    y = guide_axis_logticks()
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "Number of NBT") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off")

# plotting figure 4b
b <- tibble(
  x= df_country_complete6$native.richness.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.richness.pad,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_counting_richness,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = ifelse(conf.high >= 20000, 20000, conf.high)),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_counting_richness,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  annotate(
    "segment",
    x = 5, xend = Inf,
    y = Inf, yend = Inf,
    linetype = "dotted"
  )+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(trans = sqrt_trans,
                     expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = c(0,1000,10000,100000,300000),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  guides(
    y = guide_axis_logticks()
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Native richness",
       y = "Number of NBT") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  xlim = c(-0.6,NA),
                  ylim = c(NA, 20000))
```

## Domestic Contribution

```{r}

# predicted values
pred_mod_dc <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_DC, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4c
c <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$prop_DC,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_dc,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_dc,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "Domestic Contribution") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## Domestic Retention

```{r}
# predicted values
pred_mod_dr <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_DR, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4d
d <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$prop_DR,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_dr,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_dr,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "Domestic Retention") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## Native turnover

```{r}

pred_mod_beta_native <- 
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_turnover_native, "n.museums.pad[-0.40:4 by=.05]")


# plotting figure 4e
e <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$native.beta.model,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_beta_native,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_beta_native,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Number of Museums",
       y = "Native turnover") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## NBT turnover

```{r}
# predictions
pred_mod_beta_type <- 
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_turnover_nbt, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4f
f <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.beta.model,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_beta_type,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_beta_type,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "NBT turnover") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## Joining all plots

```{r}
fig_model <-
  a+b+c+d+e+f+
  patchwork::plot_annotation(tag_levels = "a")+
  patchwork::plot_layout(nrow = 3)
```

```{r}
# saving model figure

ggsave(here::here("output", "figures", "Fig4_models.png"),
       width = 6, height = 8,
       dpi = 600, plot = fig_model)
```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
# Model predictions and figures in the main text

## Loading packages, data and functions

```{r}
# data
library(readr)     # reading CSV files
library(here)      # constructing file paths
library(ggeffects) # extracting model predictions
library(tibble)    # creating tibbles (data frames)

# plots
library(scales)    # scale transformations and labels
library(ggplot2)   # data visualization
library(patchwork) # combining plots
```

Reading model results for counting, DR, DC and native and NBT turnover

```{r}
# Data from 03_C_data_preparation.qmd
df_country_complete6 <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data", "processed", "df_country_complete6.csv"))

# Data from 04_D_model_NBTs.qmd
mod_counting_NBT <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                       "models", 
                                       "model_res_counting.rds")) # NBT total countings
mod_DC <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                             "models", 
                             "model_res_dc.rds"))
mod_DR <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                             "models", 
                             "model_res_dr.rds"))
mod_turnover_native <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                          "models",
                                      "model_res_turnover_native.rds"))
mod_turnover_nbt <- readRDS(here::here("output", 
                                       "models",
                                       "model_res_turnover_nbt.rds"))

# function
sqrt_trans <- scales::trans_new("sqrt_with_zero", 
                        transform = function(x) ifelse(x == 0, 0, sqrt(x)),
                        inverse = function(x) x^2)
```

## Total NBT counting

```{r}
# Extracting predicted values
pred_mod_counting_gdp <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_counting_NBT, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

pred_mod_counting_richness <-
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_counting_NBT, "native.richness.pad[-0.4:8.6 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4a
a <-
  tibble(
  x= df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.richness.pad,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_counting_gdp,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_counting_gdp,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(trans = sqrt_trans,
                     expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = c(0,100,1000,10000),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  guides(
    y = guide_axis_logticks()
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "Number of NBT") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off")

# plotting figure 4b
b <- tibble(
  x= df_country_complete6$native.richness.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.richness.pad,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_counting_richness,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = ifelse(conf.high >= 20000, 20000, conf.high)),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_counting_richness,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  annotate(
    "segment",
    x = 5, xend = Inf,
    y = Inf, yend = Inf,
    linetype = "dotted"
  )+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(trans = sqrt_trans,
                     expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = c(0,1000,10000,100000,300000),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  guides(
    y = guide_axis_logticks()
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Native richness",
       y = "Number of NBT") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  xlim = c(-0.6,NA),
                  ylim = c(NA, 20000))
```

## Native turnover

```{r}

pred_mod_beta_native <- 
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_turnover_native, "n.museums.pad[-0.40:4 by=.05]")


# plotting figure 4e
e <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$native.beta.model,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_beta_native,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_beta_native,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1))+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Number of Museums",
       y = "Native turnover") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## NBT turnover

```{r}
# predictions
pred_mod_beta_type <- 
  ggeffects::ggpredict(mod_turnover_nbt, "gdp.pad[-1:4 by=.05]")

# plotting figure 4f
f <- tibble(
  x = df_country_complete6$gdp.pad,
  y = df_country_complete6$type.beta.model,
  country = df_country_complete6$country,
  region = df_country_complete6$region
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_ribbon(data = pred_mod_beta_type,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted,
                  ymin = conf.low,
                  ymax = conf.high),
              alpha = 0.2)+
  geom_line(data = pred_mod_beta_type,
              aes(x = x,
                  y = predicted))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = region),
             shape = 21)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0,0)),
                     breaks = seq(0,10,1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0)),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale()))+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Europe & Central Asia" = "#E64B35FF",
      "East Asia & Pacific" = "#4DBBD5FF",
      "North America" = "#3C5488FF",
      "South Asia" = "#B09C85FF",
      "Latin America & Caribbean" = "#00A087FF",
      "Sub-Saharan Africa" = "#F39B7FFF",
      "Middle East & North Africa" = "#8491B4FF"
    )
  )+
  labs(x = "Gross Domestic Product - GDP",
       y = "NBT turnover") +
  theme_classic()+
    theme(
      axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
      axis.text = element_text(color = "black"),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(linetype = "dashed",
                                      lineend = "round"),
      legend.position = "none"
        )+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off",
                  ylim = c(0,1))
```

## Joining all plots

```{r}
fig_model <-
  a+b+c+d+e+f+
  patchwork::plot_annotation(tag_levels = "a")+
  patchwork::plot_layout(nrow = 3)
```

```{r}
# saving model figure

ggsave(here::here("output", "figures", "Fig4_models.png"),
       width = 6, height = 8,
       dpi = 600, plot = fig_model)
```
